titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary duty suspension on certain capers in immediate containers each holding more than 3.4 kilograms.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/29/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on certain capers in immediate containers each holding more than 3.4 kilograms.
